issue.title: [C++/Python] Add release verification script for Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1348](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1348). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since I don't use Windows every day, it takes me a bit of time to conduct release verification on Windows. It would be nice to make this more automated in a batch file, e.g.

```Java
dev/release/verify-release-candidate.bat %PATH_TO_RC_TARBALL%
```
